item.title: Zurroball! Updated (April 14, 2007)! First Script
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“omgnomorenames, post:1, topic:79132”]My first Script Please Give Feedback!

[size=40pt]Report Any Bugs Or Scores Please I want to know if this Is working[/size]

Automaticly picks up next ball even if colour changes!
I got a highscore of 2240 :eek:
Just recently got a score of 26,000 on metal but neopets logged me off after an hour… couldn’t send score :mad:

Known Problems:
With metal it will select anything with the same colour which is the background itself.

Script Information:
Game Size is 600 by 400
Works best on normal, and metal haven’t yet got it to be able to do lightning or eyeball yet.
Select Speed, but 20 seems to work the best for me
Auto colour
Auto Sendscore if wanted
Setup Lines are 17-23

Update Information:
Added an auto restart and Updated some of the info!

Script Just Copy and Paste:

[code]program OmgnomorenamesZurroBlaster;
//My Zurroball Script By: Omgnomorenames
//Took out the choice to do Snot, Lightning and Eyeball
//Wasn’t working properly
//Added choice to have auto restart
//Game Window should be 600 by 400!
//
//Start Zurroball
//Setup lines 19 and 22

var
Ball,Ball2,speed,runs: Integer;
x,y: Integer;
BallType,BallTime: Integer;
SendScore,RestartScript: String;

procedure Setup;
begin
//Setup
speed:= 20{Mouse Click speed 20-40 is good}
BallType:= 5{2=Metal,5=Normal}
//
SendScore:=‘Yes’{Yes or No}
RestartScript:=‘No’{Will repeat 3 times if selected}
//
//End of Setup Do not Touch anything else unless you
//know what you doing
end;
//Checks What ball is selected and Starts that ball
procedure Start;
begin
if Balltype = 1 then
begin
Balltime:= 100;
ClickMouse(326,271,true)
end else
if BallType = 2 then
begin
Balltime:=100
ClickMouse(334, 306,true)
end else
if BallType = 3 then
begin
Balltime:=200
ClickMouse(333,340,true)
end else
if BallType = 4 then
begin
Balltime:=100
ClickMouse(331,372,true)
end else
if BallType = 5 then
begin
BallTime:=100
ClickMouse(303,192,true)
end else
end;
//Self explained Finds and Clicks Ball
procedure ClickBall;
begin
if (FindColor(x,y,Ball2,1,1,600,319))
then begin
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
ball:=0
end else;
begin
ball:= ball+1;
end;
end;
//Main for each ball
procedure Runball;
begin
wait (2000)
Ball2:= GetColor(248, 88);
repeat
ClickBall;
wait(speed+random(5))
until (ball=BallTime);
end;
//Sendscore when complete if selected
procedure SendScores;
begin
if (SendScore = ‘Yes’) or (SendScore = ‘yes’) then
begin
ClickMouse (244, 344,true)
end else;
end;
//Main
begin
repeat
Setup;
Start;
Runball;
ball:=0;
Runball;
ball:=0;
Runball;
SendScores;
if (RestartScript = ‘No’) or (RestartScript = ‘no’) then
begin
runs:=3
end else;
if (RestartScript = ‘Yes’) or (RestartScript = ‘yes’) then
begin
ClickMouse(202, 305,true)
end;
runs:=runs+1
wait(1000)
until(runs >= 3)
end.[/code]

Next Project/s:
FrumBall[/quote]
This script won’t work.Try editing the script.Like putting a const.

Read full topic

item.title: Zurroball! Updated (April 14, 2007)! First Script
item.dc:creator: @omgnomorenames omgnomorenames
item.description:
@omgnomorenames wrote:

My first Script Please Give Feedback!

[size=40pt]Report Any Bugs Or Scores Please I want to know if this Is working[/size]

Automaticly picks up next ball even if colour changes!
I got a highscore of 2240 :eek:
Just recently got a score of 26,000 on metal but neopets logged me off after an hour… couldn’t send score :mad:

Known Problems:
With metal it will select anything with the same colour which is the background itself.

Script Information:
Game Size is 600 by 400
Works best on normal, and metal haven’t yet got it to be able to do lightning or eyeball yet.
Select Speed, but 20 seems to work the best for me
Auto colour
Auto Sendscore if wanted
Setup Lines are 17-23

Update Information:
Added an auto restart and Updated some of the info!

Script Just Copy and Paste:

[code]program OmgnomorenamesZurroBlaster;
//My Zurroball Script By: Omgnomorenames
//Took out the choice to do Snot, Lightning and Eyeball
//Wasn’t working properly
//Added choice to have auto restart
//Game Window should be 600 by 400!
//
//Start Zurroball
//Setup lines 19 and 22

var
Ball,Ball2,speed,runs: Integer;
x,y: Integer;
BallType,BallTime: Integer;
SendScore,RestartScript: String;

procedure Setup;
begin
//Setup
speed:= 20{Mouse Click speed 20-40 is good}
BallType:= 5{2=Metal,5=Normal}
//
SendScore:=‘Yes’{Yes or No}
RestartScript:=‘No’{Will repeat 3 times if selected}
//
//End of Setup Do not Touch anything else unless you
//know what you doing
end;
//Checks What ball is selected and Starts that ball
procedure Start;
begin
if Balltype = 1 then
begin
Balltime:= 100;
ClickMouse(326,271,true)
end else
if BallType = 2 then
begin
Balltime:=100
ClickMouse(334, 306,true)
end else
if BallType = 3 then
begin
Balltime:=200
ClickMouse(333,340,true)
end else
if BallType = 4 then
begin
Balltime:=100
ClickMouse(331,372,true)
end else
if BallType = 5 then
begin
BallTime:=100
ClickMouse(303,192,true)
end else
end;
//Self explained Finds and Clicks Ball
procedure ClickBall;
begin
if (FindColor(x,y,Ball2,1,1,600,319))
then begin
ClickMouse(x,y,true);
ball:=0
end else;
begin
ball:= ball+1;
end;
end;
//Main for each ball
procedure Runball;
begin
wait (2000)
Ball2:= GetColor(248, 88);
repeat
ClickBall;
wait(speed+random(5))
until (ball=BallTime);
end;
//Sendscore when complete if selected
procedure SendScores;
begin
if (SendScore = ‘Yes’) or (SendScore = ‘yes’) then
begin
ClickMouse (244, 344,true)
end else;
end;
//Main
begin
repeat
Setup;
Start;
Runball;
ball:=0;
Runball;
ball:=0;
Runball;
SendScores;
if (RestartScript = ‘No’) or (RestartScript = ‘no’) then
begin
runs:=3
end else;
if (RestartScript = ‘Yes’) or (RestartScript = ‘yes’) then
begin
ClickMouse(202, 305,true)
end;
runs:=runs+1
wait(1000)
until(runs >= 3)
end.[/code]

Next Project/s:
FrumBall
